title: Buttermilk hot cross buns
ingredients: ['120ml water', '7g dried active yeast', '235ml buttermilk, room temperature', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon bicarbonte of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste', '75g cooking margarine, melted', '400g plain flour', '100g sultanas', 'Prepared vanilla icing for the crosses']
